mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( financial_tendency_type_id, user_id, title, content, view_count, created_at, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{communityId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS boardId, b.title, b.content, u.name AS userName, f.id AS categoryId, f.name AS categoryName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_like WHERE board_id = b.id) AS likeCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE post_id = b.id) AS commentCount, EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM board_scrap WHERE board_id = b.id AND user_id = #{userId} ) AS isScraped, EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM board_like WHERE board_id = b.id AND user_id = #{userId} ) AS isLiked, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createdAt FROM board b JOIN user_profile u ON b.user_id = u.user_id JOIN financial_tendency_type f ON b.financial_tendency_type_id = f.id WHERE b.id = #{boardId} AND b.financial_tendency_type_id = #{communityId} AND b.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_scrap (user_id, board_id, financial_tendency_type_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{boardId}, #{communityId})
INSERT INTO board_like (user_id, board_id, financial_tendency_type_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{boardId}, #{communityId})
